prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Piano, Bass, Drums, Organ, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Piano, Bass, Drums, Organ - no Guitar in this song.

Style 2: This composition features Reed, Piano, Bass, Drums, and Organ, but no Guitar.

Style 3: No Guitar in this piece - instead, it includes Reed, Piano, Bass, Drums, and Organ.
